price: 60. Waxay yidhaahdeen: Waxaan maqallay wiil hadal-haya oo la yidhaahdo Ibraahiim.”
arabic: قَالُواْ سَمِعۡنَا فَتٗى يَذۡكُرُهُمۡ يُقَالُ لَهُۥٓ إِبۡرَٰهِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū samiʿ'nā fatan yadhkuruhum yuqālu lahu ib'rāhīmu
